doc.field: "Papyrus: The First Twenty-Five Years, 1931–1955. Published by the XYZ Club of Erasmus Hall High School Under the Guidance of Ruth Levinson Berkowsky"
"Papyrus: The First Twenty-Five Years, 1931–1955. Published by the XYZ Club of Erasmus Hall High School Under the Guidance of Ruth Levinson Berkowsky"
This bound memorial copy was given to EHHS by Mr. and Mrs. M. Gerson. It includes a foreword by Ellis Johnson (Chrmn., Math. Department), and Dr. John F. McNeill; and a eulogy by the faculty.
Offsite-Box: RC-4b, Volume: Papyrus: The First Twenty-Five Years
